title: Stock market news live updates: Stock futures flat as investors weigh Fed minutes, Russia-Ukraine tensions - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stock futures flat as investors weigh Fed minutes, Russia-Ukraine tensions  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stock futures dipped in pre-market trading Thursday as investors continued to weigh new insight into the Federal Reserve's plans to tighten monetary policy and persisting geopolitical tensions between Russia and Ukraine. Traders also await another trove of corporate results scheduled to trickle in along with a fresh read on weekly unemployment filings.
